resources.string: Whatever action is performed by a great man, common men follow in his footsteps. And whatever standards he sets by exemplary acts, all the world pursues.
It should be understood that all species of life, O son of KuntÄ«, are made possible by birth in this material nature, and that I am the seed-giving father.
When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
You cannot always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
